subject: Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn was disqualified for running off the course and Tanja Poutiainen of Finland won the giant slalom in La Molina, Spain, overtaking Vonn in the overall standings.
snippet: Lindsey Vonn was disqualified for running off the course and Tanja Poutiainen of Finland won the giant slalom in La Molina, Spain, overtaking Vonn in the overall standings.
